heading: HR00198
0: RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION AND DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE TO IMMEDIATELY ADDRESS THE HIGH IMPORT COSTS RESULTING TO NATIONWIDE INFLATION AND UNDULY BURDENING FILIPINO CONSUMERS AND BUSINESSES, BY REGULATING THE EXCESSIVE AND QUESTIONABLE DESTINATION CHARGES IMPOSED BY INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING LINES AND/OR THEIR AGENTS
principal-authors: ONG, RONNIE L.; YAP, ERIC G.;
status: Pending with the Committee on TRADE AND INDUSTRY since 2019-11-27
